description:
Accessorize your custom character, matching characters from some of your favorite SEGA/Atlus games. You'll have the coolest looking custom character around, with these character costumes from four games: Persona®5, Jet Set Radio™, NiGHTS™, and Super Monkey Ball™, plus a hat from PuyoPuyo™! 

In SONIC FORCES, you get to create your own custom character equipped with powerful gadgets to help Sonic take back the world – Join the Uprising.
name: SEGA / ATLUS PACK
